DOC.brief_summary: The goal study determine effect Healing Touch ( HT ) stress , anxiety , self-efficacy experience woman undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) randomize , control design . HT gentle , non-invasive form energy-balancing work promotes relaxation .
DOC.brief_title: Stress Reduction During In Vitro Fertilization
DOC.detailed_description: Once enrol , participant randomize one three group : Healing Touch ( HT ) treatment arm , Desensitization Therapy ( DT ) arm , no-intervention arm . Subjects Group 1 receive three , 45-minute HT session first two week IVF cycle prior oocyte retrieval . Group 2 receive three , 45-minute DT session first two week IVF cycle prior oocyte retrieval . Group 3 receive intervention . Subjects Group 3 offer two HT session complete study participation . All subject partner ask complete Spielberger State Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , Perceived Stress Scale ( PSS ) Infertility Self-Efficacy Scale ( ISES ) three time point : 1 ) baseline 2 ) one day prior oocyte retrieval 3 ) 5-7 day post embryo transfer . In addition , subject group complete short pre-study questionnaire assess expectation therapeutic effect , subject two intervention group complete short post-study questionnaire evaluate treatment experience . Demographic pregnancy outcome data collect subject .
DOC.criteria: Age < 43 FSH < = 14 About enter IVF cycle Stanford Fertility Reproductive Medicine Center Planning transfer fresh embryos cycle Speak read English fluently Diminished ovarian reserve Planning freeze embryo without embryo transfer cycle Planning use donor egg embryos cycle Concomitant energy work intervention ( HT , Reiki , QiGong , acupuncture ) plan IVF cycle .
